items.title: Example
items.description:
Click the buttons below to show and hide another element via class changes:

.collapse hides content
.collapsing is applied during transitions
.collapse.show shows content
Generally, we recommend using a button tag with the data-bs-target attribute. While not recommended from a semantic point of view, you can also use an <a> link with the href attribute (and a role="button"). In both cases, the data-bs-toggle="collapse" is required.
items.code:
Link with href

Some placeholder content for the collapse component. This panel is hidden by default but revealed when the user activates the relevant trigger.
